long_description: The Nitecore P15 flashlight has 7 settings-4 brightness levels and 3 strobes-to meet your lighting needs at the campsite and around the house. Cree XP-G2 (R5) LED has a maximum output of 430 lumens on turbo mode to light up the darkest trails and street corners; throws a bright beam up to 278m (912 ft.). Outputs 430 lumens on high, 150 lumens on mid, 35 lumens on low and 1 lumen on lowest setting. Includes a standard strobe mode and an SOS strobe mode; leave the flashlight in location beacon strobe mode to find it easily at night. Power-indicator light lets you know when the batteries are low and serves as an another locator beacon by flashing once every three seconds when the light is in standby mode. Use the 2-stage button on the side of the flashlight to access turbo mode and strobe mode directly with a half press and hold or a full press and hold, respectively. Flashlight can also be turned on and off using the tail-cap switch, giving you options for how you hold the light. Operates on either one 18650 or two CR123 batteries (sold separately); 18650 battery provides up to 520 hrs. of runtime on the lowest output level and 2 hrs. 15 min. on high. Non-rechargeable CR123 lithium batteries provide 310 hrs. of runtime on lowest and 1 hr. 45 min. on high. Aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and a stainless-steel retaining ring protect the core components from damage; anti-roll design keeps the light from getting away. The Nitecore P15 Flashlight has an IPX8 water resistance rating, allowing submersion down to 2m; impact resistant to 1.5m. Includes a holster, stainless-steel belt clip, tactical ring, lanyard, spare tail cap and spare O-ring.
